E_recomendado_colocar_os_valores_na_mao_.message: It is recommended to manually tune aristocrats and experts

Deve_ser_elite__comum_ou_personagem_.message: Must be elite, common or character.

Aplica_o_modificador_de_Des__em_vez_de_F.message: Apply dexterity modifier instead of strength for attach rolls with light weapons.

_4_de_bonus_nos_testes_de_Agarrar_e_nao_.message: +4 bonus on grapple checks and do not provoke attack of opportunity.

Apanha_uma_arma_arremessada_ou_projetil_.message: Catches a thrown or projectile weapon.

Considerado_armado_quando_estiver_desarm.message: Character is considered armed when unarmed.

Capaz_de_deslocar_antes_e_depois_do_ataq.message: Can move before and after attack.

Substitui_bonus_de_ataque_por_dano__maxi.message: Substitutes attack bonus by damage: maximum BAB.

Evita_os_ataques_contra_a_montaria_com_u.message: Avoids attacks against mount with a ride check.

Reduz_penalidade_ao_usar_duas_maos_em_2_.message: Reduces penalty by -2 while using two weapons.

Percorre_5_vezes_o_deslocamento_padrao__.message: Moves 5x base movement, +4 bonus on jump checks after running.

_4_de_bonus_nas_tentativas_de_desarme_e_.message: +4 bonus on disarm attempts, do not provoke attack of opportunity.

Desvia_um_ataque_a_distancia_por_rodada_.message: Dodges one ranged attack each round.

_1_de_bonus_de_esquiva_na_CA_contra_um_a.message: +1 dodge bonus on AC against one opponent.

_4_de_bonus_no_dano_com_a_arma_escolhida.message: +4 damage bonus with chosen weapon instead of +2.

_1_de_bonus_nas_jogadas_de_ataque_com_a_.message: +1 bonus on attack rolls with chosen weapon.

_1_de_bonus_na_CD_dos_testes_de_resisten.message: +1 on DC of saves for spells of a specific school of magic.

Conjura_magias_ignorando_os_componentes_.message: Ignores material components while casting spell.

Pode_se_deslocar_antes_e_depois_de_uma_i.message: Can move before and after a mounted charge.

_4_de_bonus_nas_tentativas_de_derrubar_e.message: +4 bonus on trip tests and does not provoke attack of opportunity.

Substitui_bonus_de_ataque_por_CA__maximo.message: Can exchange attack bonus for CA, maximum 5 points.

Personagem_atrai_parceiros_e_seguidores_.message: Attracts loyal companions and devoted followers.

_2_de_bonus_nos_testes_de_conjurador_con.message: +2 bonus on spell resistance checks for a school of magic.
+2 bonus on spell resistance checks for a school of magic (cumulative).

_4_de_bonus_nos_teste_de_Concentracao_pa.message: +4 bonus on concentration checks while casting on defensive.

_4_de_bonus_de_esquiva_na_CA_contra_ataq.message: +4 bonus dodge bonus on CA against attacks of opportunity.

_2_de_bonus_nos_testes_de_Diplomacia_e_S.message: +2 bonus on diplomacy and sense motive checks.

Bonus_de__2_em_ouvir_e_observar_.message: +2 bonus on listen and spot checks.

Permite_numero_de_ataques_de_oportunidad.message: Allows a number of attacks of opportunity equal to dexterity bonus.

Saca_uma_arma_branca_como_acao_livre_.message: Draw light melee weapon as free action.

_1_de_bonus_nos_ataques_a_distancia_e_da.message: +1 bonus on attack and damage against targets within 30 feet.

Dispara_duas_ou_mais_flechas_simultaneam.message: Can fire two or more arrows simultaneously.

Anula_a_penalidade_por_disparar_contra_u.message: Removes -4 penalty against shooting at opponents in melee.

Um_ataque_a_distancia_adicional_por_roda.message: One extra ranged attack per round.

_4_de_bonus_nos_testes_para_resistir_a_d.message: +4 bonus on tests to resist non lethal damage while swimming, running, forced march, breathing, starvarion, cold, heat. Can sleep on light or medium armor without fatigue.

Nao_sofre_penalidades_nos_ataques_com_ar.message: No penalty while using simple weapons.

Nao_sofre_penalidade_nos_ataques_com_uma.message: Do not suffer attack penalty with a specific common weapon.
Do not suffer attack penalty with an exotic weapon.

Nao_sofre_penalidade_de_armadura_nas_jog.message: Do not suffer armor penalty on attack rolls.

Conserva_o_bonus_do_escudo_na_CA_quando_.message: Keep shield bonus during shield bash.

Permite_a_criacao_de_armas__armaduras_e_.message: Can create magic weapons, armors and shields.

Permite_conjurar_magia_como_acao_livre__.message: Cast spell as free action, costs three levels higher.

Dobra_a_area_da_magia__ao_custo_de_tres_.message: Doubles spell area, costs three levels higher.

Dobra_o_alcance_da_magia__ao_custo_de_um.message: Doubles spell range, costs one level higher.

Conjura_a_magia_num_nivel_mais_elevado__.message: Casts spell as if a higher level, changing its DC, level checks etc.

Dobra_a_duracao_da_magia__ao_custo_de_um.message: Doubles spell duration, cost one level higher.

Ignora_os_componentes_gestuais_da_magia_.message: Ignore somatic components, costs one level higher.

Ignora_os_componentes_verbais_da_magia__.message: Ignores the verbal components of the spell, costs one level higher.

Maximiza_todas_as_variaveis_numericas_do.message: Maximize all variables of the spell effect, costs 3 levels higher.

Aumenta_em_50__todas_as_variaveis_numeri.message: Increases 50% on all numeric varibles of the spell effect, costs 2 levels higher.

Aumenta_deslocamento_basico_em_dois_quad.message: Increases movement by 2 squares, _5 competence on jump checks.

Andar_na_neve_com_deslocamento_normal__s.message: Movement on snow and ice without penalty, leaving no trail. Endure elements effect.

Permite_usar_velocidade_por_10_rodadas_e.message: Haste 10 rounds per day, durantion can be split along the day.

Idiomas_do_Sol_e_da_Lua.message: Tongue of the sun and moon

Para_talentos_que_nao_estao_presentes_na.message: Other feats not included in this app.

Ganha_1d10____1_PV___nivel__temporarios_.message: Gain 1d10 + (1 / level) temporary hp for 1h / level.

Concede_habilidade_para_andar_em_parede_.message: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

Torna_3_m_quadrados_ou_um_objeto_escorre.message: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

O_alvo_fica_invisivel_durante_1_min_nive.message: Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.
